h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea
content: The creatures also has little mouths on each of its kneecaps that can also emit flames, and while they don't travel as far, the monster will constantly spin around to shoot fire on all sides.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Monk from the Sea'.
The content is as follows:
The creatures also has little mouths on each of its kneecaps that can also emit flames, and while they don't travel as far, the monster will constantly spin around to shoot fire on all sides.
